class.name: ParameterJacobianWrapper

javadoc.text: Wrapper class to compute Jacobian matrices by finite differences for ODE * which do not compute them by themselves.
Raw ODE without Jacobian computation skill to be wrapped into a ParameterJacobianProvider.
Steps for finite difference computation of the Jacobian df/dp w.r.t. parameters.
Wrap a {@link ParameterizedODE} into a {@link ParameterJacobianProvider}.
javadoc.param: fode main first order differential equations set
pode secondary problem, without parameter Jacobian computation skill
paramsAndSteps parameters and steps to compute the Jacobians df/dp

method.name: ParameterJacobianWrapper
method.comment: set up parameters for jacobian computation

method.name: computeParameterJacobian
method.comment: compute the jacobian df/dp w.r.t. parameter
